courses.subject: CLED
courses.title: Immersion Experience - Putonghua
courses.description: The course is designed to provide students with opportunities to study and use Putonghua in a first language context while engaging themselves with the Putonghua culture, thus resulting in gains in language, professional and personal development. The course will be conducted in the format of a study programme to be conducted overseas. The course will include components such as language enhancement, cultural orientation and school experience or the equivalent.
courses.learning_outcomes:
●通過備考普通話水平測試語言課程，提高普通話語言能力，包括聽、說、讀等等。
●通過在地生活及文化體驗，提高日常會話及普通話交際能力。
●通過中、小學語言教學觀摩，了解不同教學背景下的語文教學模式、課程設計、教學法應用以及教學實施情況。拓寬視野，學習從不同角度去思考語文教學的形式、概念及組織。
courses.course_syllabus:
●普通話進修
備考普通話水平測試為主的普通話沉浸課程。具體內容包括：
普通話語音知識學習、朗讀及口語訓練、正音練習。
專題講座
一對一指導

●當地生活沉浸體驗（普通話語言、生活習俗等）
文化體驗、與內地大學生語言交流、文化歷史景點參觀。
●中、小學語文教學觀摩
觀摩中、小學課堂教學；當地語文老師分享教學經驗。

●課堂及課外意見交流收集反饋信息。

courses.description: The course aims at helping students develop the basic listening and speaking skills of Putonghua. courses.subject: CLED
courses.title: Language, Thought and Writing
courses.description: This course aims at developing the students’ writing ability by deepening their understanding of cognitive processes in writing, and raising their awareness in monitoring/revising their own writing. These are achieved and supported by both lectures on related theories and writing/revising exercises. This course also introduces common writing difficulties of secondary/primary students and effective teaching strategies, so as to develop the students’ understanding of the principles and strategies of writing instruction.

courses.description: This course aims at helping learners master the basic teaching skills and develop the ability of instructional design in Chinese language teaching. The following topics will be discussed in the course: the characteristics, the objectives, the contents and the principles of teaching Chinese. The course also covers the teaching of listening, speaking, reading and writing, the teaching of basic language knowledge and the design of instructional task in the Target-Oriented Curriculum.

courses.subject: CLED
courses.title: Psychology in Chinese Language Teaching
courses.description: This course introduces different psychological theories in Chinese language teaching. It aims at enhancing students' language teaching abilities through applying the principles of these theories in their instructional design and practices. This course will include topics of language acquisition; language development; psychological processes involved in word recognition, comprehension, writing, and conversational interaction; language learning and cognitive development; and motivation theories in language learning.

courses.description: This course aims to enhance students’ professional competence of Chinese language teaching through mastering and applying the theories, principles, and methods of curriculum and teaching materials design in designing and adapting school-based Chinese language curriculum and teaching materials. courses.description: This course is an extended course of CLED4720. Instructors will guide students to conduct a small-scale of classroom research in Chinese language teaching. Students have to collect data during their Teaching Supervision and analyze data afterward. It aims to facilitate students’ professional development through enhancing their understanding and reflection on their personal teaching ability, students’ language learning needs, and other factors affecting teaching and learning Chinese language.

courses.learning_outcomes:
完成本科的學習後，學員應具備以下的知識、能力或態度：
1. 掌握及應用各種教育研究的方法進行中國語文教學相關的探究；
2. 掌握收集和分析研究資料的原則和方法；
3. 針對研究結果，對個人的教學能力、學生語文學習的需要以及其他影響語文教學的因素作出認真的反思；
4. 結合語文教學理論、實踐經驗以及研究結果，撰寫出完整的研究報告；
5. 對進行中文教學研究抱持正面的態度，並培養出有系統收集資料以了解、反思和改善教學的習慣，通過教學研究促進專業成長。
courses.course_syllabus:
本科包括全班授課、個別指導和口頭匯報三種上課形式：

* *1. 全班授課：**由本科統籌老師教授教育研究常用工具的設計理念、量化和質化資料的分析方法、討論和反思研究結果的原則、撰寫教育研究論文的原則以及研究倫理。

* *2. 個別指導** **：**由所屬的指導老師定期約見學員，協助學員應用所學的教育研究方法構思研究設計、完成研究工具、分析所收集的研究資料和反思研究結果。

3. **口頭匯報：**學員於實習結束後須就所收集的研究資料跟導師作初步討論，並初步整理研究結果，於課堂上作口頭匯報，與同學和老師分享研究所得，並根據所收集的意見，進一步完善論文的內容。
courses.feedback_evaluation:
1. 本科導師會於本學年開始時就本科的各項安排徵詢學員的意見，以改善本年的安排。
2. 在修讀本科期間，學員可就課程內容、活動、進度、習作等以面談、電話或電郵等方式向所屬導師反映意見，以改善本年的教學。

3. 本科結束後，會於師生諮詢會詢問學生代表對本科的意見，作整體課程檢討。

courses.title: Current Issues in Chinese Language Education
courses.description: This course is designed to enrich students' understanding of current trends, including recent policy initiatives, curriculum developments or research, in Chinese language education. The background and implications of these issues on the teaching and learning of Chinese will be analysed. Ways to address these issues at the school and classroom levels will be explored. It aims to develop students' professional ability to apply the new educational theories and concepts in their daily Chinese language teaching under the changing curriculum.

3. 應用本科所學設計和實施教學以回應中文教育課程最新發展。
